Title: "Limitations of Filter Expressions in Lambda Expressions Explained"

578581))'))not rooms/any()Not every feature of filter expressions is available inside the body of a lambdaexpression. The limitations differ depending on the data type of the collection field thatyou want to filter. The following table summarizes the limitations.Data typeFeatures allowed inlambda expressions withanyFeatures allowed inlambda expressionswith allCollection(Edm.
